Depict the Quantum Gold mana action ‘Echo Jump Crack’ a punch that fractures air like glass, seen from a ground‑level tracking shot. The setting is floating islands tangled in time rifts, colored with antique gold, violet undertones, prismatic edges; soft diffraction rainbows on metal, fractured afterimages trailing motion. Emphasize painterly realism: layered color, micro‑detail in focal areas, looser strokes in the distance, subtle edge variation, natural bloom and depth of field. Full‑frame composition, cinematic but unmistakably hand‑painted.
